long_description: Correlation searches through all pairwise relationship between two quantitative attributes             (e.g., pickup_latitude, pickup_longitude). The visualizations are ranked from most to least linearly correlated based on                 their Pearsonâ€™s correlation score.
collection:
[<Vis  (x: pickup_longitude , y: pickup_latitude ) mark: scatter, score: 1.00 >,
 <Vis  (x: dropoff_longitude, y: dropoff_latitude) mark: scatter, score: 1.00 >,
 <Vis  (x: fare_amount      , y: total_amount    ) mark: scatter, score: 0.98 >,
 <Vis  (x: dropoff_latitude , y: pickup_latitude ) mark: scatter, score: 0.90 >,
 <Vis  (x: dropoff_longitude, y: pickup_latitude ) mark: scatter, score: 0.90 >,
 <Vis  (x: dropoff_longitude, y: pickup_longitude) mark: scatter, score: 0.90 >,
 <Vis  (x: dropoff_latitude , y: pickup_longitude) mark: scatter, score: 0.90 >,
 <Vis  (x: trip_distance    , y: fare_amount     ) mark: scatter, score: 0.88 >,
 <Vis  (x: trip_distance    , y: total_amount    ) mark: scatter, score: 0.88 >,
 <Vis  (x: tip_amount       , y: total_amount    ) mark: scatter, score: 0.67 >,
 <Vis  (x: tolls_amount     , y: total_amount    ) mark: scatter, score: 0.62 >,
 <Vis  (x: trip_distance    , y: tolls_amount    ) mark: scatter, score: 0.59 >,
 <Vis  (x: tolls_amount     , y: fare_amount     ) mark: scatter, score: 0.55 >,
 <Vis  (x: tip_amount       , y: fare_amount     ) mark: scatter, score: 0.53 >,
 <Vis  (x: trip_distance    , y: tip_amount      ) mark: scatter, score: 0.48 >]

long_description: Distribution displays univariate histogram distributions of all quantitative attributes (e.g., trip_distance). Visualizations are ranked from most to least skewed.
collection:
[<Vis  (x: BIN(tip_amount)       , y: COUNT(Record)) mark: histogram, score: 2.67 >,
 <Vis  (x: BIN(total_amount)     , y: COUNT(Record)) mark: histogram, score: 2.67 >,
 <Vis  (x: BIN(extra)            , y: COUNT(Record)) mark: histogram, score: 2.67 >,
 <Vis  (x: BIN(trip_distance)    , y: COUNT(Record)) mark: histogram, score: 2.67 >,
 <Vis  (x: BIN(tolls_amount)     , y: COUNT(Record)) mark: histogram, score: 2.67 >,
 <Vis  (x: BIN(dropoff_longitude), y: COUNT(Record)) mark: histogram, score: 2.67 >,
 <Vis  (x: BIN(fare_amount)      , y: COUNT(Record)) mark: histogram, score: 2.67 >,
 <Vis  (x: BIN(dropoff_latitude) , y: COUNT(Record)) mark: histogram, score: 2.66 >,
 <Vis  (x: BIN(pickup_longitude) , y: COUNT(Record)) mark: histogram, score: 2.66 >,
 <Vis  (x: BIN(pickup_latitude)  , y: COUNT(Record)) mark: histogram, score: 2.66 >]

description:
Show frequency of occurrence for

categorical

attributes.
long_description: Occurence displays bar charts of counts for all categorical attributes (e.g., VendorID). Visualizations are ranked from most to least uneven across the bars.
collection:
[<Vis  (x: COUNT(Record), y: mta_tax              ) mark: bar, score: 0.59 >,
 <Vis  (x: COUNT(Record), y: store_and_fwd_flag   ) mark: bar, score: 0.56 >,
 <Vis  (x: COUNT(Record), y: improvement_surcharge) mark: bar, score: 0.55 >,
 <Vis  (x: COUNT(Record), y: RateCodeID           ) mark: bar, score: 0.43 >,
 <Vis  (x: COUNT(Record), y: payment_type         ) mark: bar, score: 0.34 >,
 <Vis  (x: COUNT(Record), y: passenger_count      ) mark: bar, score: 0.23 >,
 <Vis  (x: COUNT(Record), y: VendorID             ) mark: bar, score: 0.02 >]

long_description: Temporal displays line charts for all attributes related to datetimes in the dataframe.
collection:
[<Vis  (x: tpep_pickup_datetime , y: COUNT(Record)) mark: line, score: 0.00 >,
 <Vis  (x: tpep_dropoff_datetime, y: COUNT(Record)) mark: line, score: 0.00 >]
